about.summary: Innovative Android Developer with over 2 years of experience in building high-performance mobile applications. Currently working as SDE II at JioCinema, where I optimize apps that serve millions of users during India's largest streaming events.

experience.title: SDE II - Android
achievements: Optimized app startup time by 60% through advanced initialization strategies
Maintained 99.9% crash-free rate during IPL 2024 with 50M+ concurrent users
Led Android TV player redesign improving user engagement by 40%
Implemented advanced caching mechanisms reducing data usage by 30%

experience.title: SDE I - Android
achievements: Redesigned Android TV Player Skin with modern UI/UX principles
Built Login with QR Code feature improving authentication speed by 70%
Improved rendering time by 40% through view optimization
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver features on schedule

projects.name: Tetris Game
projects.description: Modern implementation of classic Tetris using Jetpack Compose and MVVM architecture.

projects.name: Weather App
projects.description: Beautiful weather application with dynamic UI based on weather conditions.

projects.name: Portfolio Website
projects.description: Interactive portfolio with 3D graphics, terminal interface, and retro games.
